Introduction

SHA SHA was a six-member girl group under Major Entertainment. They made their official debut on February 27, 2018, with the single album "You & Me Forever SHASHA."

On July 17, 2019, after one year of promotions, Major Entertainment announced that SHA SHA had disbanded.
